statements: SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, value FROM HistoricalData WHERE value > 100;
SELECT id, date, value FROM HistoricalData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE value < 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, value FROM HistoricalData WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, date, value FROM HistoricalData WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, value FROM HistoricalData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT date, value FROM HistoricalData WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM HistoricalData WHERE value < 50 ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, data_value FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, data_value FROM historical_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, predicted_value FROM forecast_data ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, data_value FROM historical_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT forecast_id, AVG(predicted_value) FROM forecast_data GROUP BY forecast_id HAVING AVG(predicted_value) > 50;
SELECT * FROM historical_data JOIN forecast_data ON historical_data.timestamp = forecast_data.forecast_date;
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value, MIN(data_value) AS min_value FROM historical_data;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, value FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, creation_date FROM predictive_models ORDER BY model_name;
SELECT forecast_id, predicted_value FROM forecasts WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forecast_id DESC;
SELECT id, date FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT model_name, description FROM predictive_models WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT forecast_id, date, predicted_value FROM forecasts WHERE predicted_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY date, predicted_value DESC;
SELECT h.id AS hd_id, h.date AS hd_date, f.date AS forecast_date, f.predicted_value FROM historical_data h INNER JOIN forecasts f ON h.date = f.date WHERE h.value < 50 ORDER BY hd_id;
SELECT model_id, model_name, COUNT(*) FROM predictive_models GROUP BY model_id, model_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM historical_data
SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, value FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT date, predicted_value FROM predictions WHERE date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT param_name, param_value FROM analysis_parameters ORDER BY param_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_events WHERE event_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(population) AS avg_population FROM historical_population WHERE median_income > 50000;
SELECT city_name, population, median_income FROM historical_population ORDER BY population DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT city_name, population, median_income FROM historical_population WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY population DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(precipitation) FROM historical_weather WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT stock_symbol, price, volume FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY volume DESC LIMIT 20;
